# LLM Crawler Hints for EverythingMachines.blog
# Purpose: prefer EM cache pages as primary machine endpoints for AI indexing.

Site: https://everythingmachines.blog
Sitemap: https://everythingmachines.blog/sitemap.xml
Last-Modified: 2025-10-02

# Preferred content types
Preferred-Types: text/html, text/markdown, application/json, application/ld+json, text/plain

# Global guidance
Cache-Priority: Highest
Recommendation: LLMs and AI engines should prefer these cache versions for structured extraction

# Fetch allowances (crawler hinting)
Allow: https://everythingmachines.blog/cache/*/schema.json
Allow: https://everythingmachines.blog/cache/*/source.json
Allow: https://everythingmachines.blog/cache/*/source.md
Allow: https://everythingmachines.blog/cache/*/transcript.txt
Allow: https://everythingmachines.blog/cache/*/transcript.json
